ComicInfo.Summary:
The alien robot GRURK has been waylaid by bunting, but its inexorable march towards London cannot be stopped!
At Trumpington Abbey, space scientist Dr. Boy Brett and his assistant Doris Night (a lady) welcome reinforcements from the British Army â€“ but do the soldiers herald a heightened level of competence... or a right royal Carry On? And what part does a field-full of mouldy turnips have to play in the enfolding cosmic drama?!
A blast for fans of Mystery Science Theater 3000 and classic low-budget science fiction, this gorgeous, affectionate pastiche will keep you guessing - and laughing - throughout!
